notes.text: this season was hardest for me to hit KoG, i tried all kinds of decks but nothing worked then i remembered my trustworthy rez deck i used to get KoG for last like 10 seasons and never changed many cards i went 15-0 from legend 1 to KoG in 2 hours against all kinds of decks as well as meta and tier 1-3 decks also facing a lot of ojama go stall and stuff like that which gave me hard time but in the end i pulled through even tho i bricked few games i managed to make comeback I am so happy rez can still make it and it has some chance against all these p2w meta trash decks snipe hunter was big mvp too sorry for the novel guys i am just happy i made it even tho i thought i wouldn't I am also f2p so I  don't have access to all the meta decks which makes it that much harder all in all it was hard but nice run
